    • logicSynthesis.algorithm.Yosys.YosysEdifUtils

extends java.lang.Object
    The YosysEdifUtils class is class with utility methods for the Yosys instances.

    Today

    • Method Detail

      • convertEdifToNetlist

        public static void convertEdifToNetlist(Yosys yosys,
                                        java.lang.String filename,
                                        results.netlist.Netlist netlist)
        Translates the EDIF file referenced by parameter filename into the Netlist in parameter netlist using the Yosys algorithm instance.
        Parameters:
        yosys - the Yosys algorithm instance
        filename - the EDIF file
        netlist - the netlist
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if:
        Any of the parameters are null
        Error accessing filename
        Error parsing filename

      • setEdge

        protected static void setEdge(results.netlist.NetlistNode src,
                              results.netlist.NetlistNode dst,
                              edu.byu.ece.edif.core.EdifNet net,
                              results.netlist.Netlist netlist)
        Initializes a NetlistEdge in the Netlist defined by parameter netlist with: attributes defined by parameter net, source node defined by parameter src, and, destination node defined by parameter dst
        Parameters:
        src - the source node
        dst - the destination node
        net - the attributes
        netlist - the Netlist

      • getNode

        protected static results.netlist.NetlistNode getNode(java.lang.String Name,
                                                     java.lang.String type,
                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,results.netlist.NetlistNode> map,
                                                     results.netlist.Netlist netlist)
        Assigns the NetlistNode with its name defined by parameter Name with result for the logicSynthesis stage defined by parameter type. If the NetlistNode with its name defined by parameter Name is not present in the translation bookeeper defined by parameter map, then initialize a new NetlistNode and insert it into the Netlist defined by parameter netlist. Returns the assigned or initialized NetlistNode.
        Parameters:
        Name - the name of the NetlistNode
        type - the result for the logicSynthesis stage
        map - the translation bookeeper
        netlist - the Netlist
        Returns:
        the assigned or initialized NetlistNode

      • hasTopInput

        protected static boolean hasTopInput(edu.byu.ece.edif.core.EdifNet net)
        Returns a boolean flag signifying that the parameter net is connected to an input port
        Parameters:
        net - the Net
        Returns:
        true if the parameter net is connected to an input port, otherwise false.

      • hasTopOutput

        protected static boolean hasTopOutput(edu.byu.ece.edif.core.EdifNet net)
        Returns a boolean flag signifying that the parameter net is connected to an output port
        Parameters:
        net - the Net
        Returns:
        true if the parameter net is connected to an output port, otherwise false.
